desc: Straw the Line NZ brings you the Raw Straw. New Zealand's first edible eco-friendly, 100% natural, 100% biodegradable straw, gluten free and vegan friendly. Made from rice, tapioca starch and natural food colouring, these straws will make a strawsome addition to any drink, smoothie or cocktail!

layout.text: Bringing you the 'Raw Straw' - New Zealand's first 100% biodegradable edible rice straw. Join us in saving the planet one slurp at a time.
